description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. THIS GAME IS FOR XBOX LIVE ENABLED PROFILES ONLY. English chatpad is supported.  Full autocomplete support for built-in, chatpad, and T9-style messaging keyboards.  Full group messaging and banlist support.  Built-in Text Art that you can send to your friends.  Also some new letters have been added. ♪
description.short: THIS GAME IS FOR XBOX LIVE ENABLED PROFILES ONLY. English chatpad is supported.  Full autocomplete support for built-in, chatpad, and T9-style messaging keyboards.  Full group messaging and banlist support.  Built-in Text Art that you can send to your friends.  Also some new letters have been added. ♪
